title: Tourism Advances Climate Action at COP30 with Stronger Governance and Adaptation Focus
description: Tourism reaffirmed its growing role in global climate action at COP30, building on the momentum from COP29. Over two dedicated Tourism Thematic Days (19–20 November), UN Tourism and the Ministry of Tourism of Brazil convened a broad range of tourism stakehold…
